Name: Espresso Daiquiri
Ingredients: 45 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with 3 coffee beans floated in a petal formation in the centre of the cocktail's foamy head.
Review: A rum-based twist on the ubiquitous and very tasty Espresso Martini .
Nutrition: One serving of Espresso Daiquiri contains 134 calories
